section.heading: Person entitled to file initial financing statement or continuation statement.
section.text: A person may file an initial financing statement or a continuation statement under this part if:

para.text: The secured party of record authorizes the filing; and “(b) The filing is necessary under this part:
To continue the effectiveness of a financing statement filed before the applicability date; or
To perfect or continue the perfection of a security interest.

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.annotation: Applicability of D.C. Law 19-302: Section 4 of D.C. Law 19-302 provided that the act shall apply as of July 1, 2013.
